description:
Give ants their marching orders—with double the coverage

Ant Adios Insect & Ant Killer (2-pack) controls ants and other insects, eliminating damaging ant mounds in your yard twice as effectively.

Our easy-to-apply granular bait now comes in a convenient 2-pack, providing targeted mound, lawn, and perimeter applications across larger outdoor spaces. Ideal for edible and vegetable gardens, it's approved for organic gardening. Say hello to better ingredients and a bigger "adios" to unwanted ants.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

sections.product_features:
Bio-based ant control for yard, garden, and outdoor home
Kills ants, earwigs, cutworms, sowbugs, pillbugs, and crickets
Mound and ant hill control for all listed ants
Effective for up to 4 weeks
OMRI-listed for organic gardening
Safe for use around all edible plants
Odor-free
Ready to use—just shake and pour!
Coverage up to 8,000 sq. ft.
sections.ingredients: Spinosad: Bacterium-derived spinosad ant and insect bait for your home and yard.
sections.instructions:
Apply spring through fall when ants are active outdoors. In southernmost regions, pests may be active year-round.
Apply to mounds, home perimeter or lawns: Mound application: Apply 0.5–1 teaspoon per square yard on ant trails or near ant mounds. Home perimeter application: Scatter a 6-inch barrier (a few pellets per inch) along the perimeter of your home. Lawn broadcast application: Apply 0.5–1 lb per 1,000 sq. ft. of lawn.
Mound application: Apply 0.5–1 teaspoon per square yard on ant trails or near ant mounds.
Home perimeter application: Scatter a 6-inch barrier (a few pellets per inch) along the perimeter of your home.
Lawn broadcast application: Apply 0.5–1 lb per 1,000 sq. ft. of lawn.
Reapply every 2 to 4 weeks as bait is consumed. If a rain event occurs or bait gets wet, reapply once the area dries.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
What's the benefit of the Ant Adios 2-pack?
The 2-pack provides double the amount of bait, allowing for extended coverage up to 8,000 sq. ft. It's ideal for larger properties or for ensuring you have enough product on hand for reapplications.
What pests does Ant Adios control?
Ant Adios controls and kills most common ants, including foraging ants, sweet-feeding ants, pavement ants, moisture ants, little black ants, Argentine ants, crazy ants, acrobat ants, bigheaded ants, cornfield ants, ghost ants, odorous house ants, thief ants, Texas leaf-cutting ants, and field ants. It also controls earwigs, cutworms, sowbugs, pillbugs, and crickets.
Note: Ant Adios does not control carpenter ants, fire ants, harvester ants, or pharaoh ants.
What is the active ingredient? How does it work?
The active ingredient in Ant Adios is spinosad, derived from the fermentation of Saccharopolyspora spinosa, a naturally occurring soil organism. It works by attracting pests to consume the bait, effectively killing them through ingestion.
Can I apply Ant Adios alongside other Sunday products?
Yes! Ant Adios pairs perfectly with other Sunday products. Apply Ant Adios after any liquid applications have dried to ensure the bait doesn't get wet. If the bait gets wet, reapply once the area dries.
Any state restrictions?
Ant Adios is approved for use in all states.
